name: Noot
description:
Help Noot regain his memories!

*****************************************************************

Controls described in game.

If lagging, check browser setting to make sure "Enable hardware acceleration" is not turned off. If that does not solve it, try downloading the game (Windows only).

Source code available at: https://github.com/Intradom/Noot

Have fun!

*****************************************************************

External assets:

Background music track: 8 bit Surf by David Renda (https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6)
